code:
json
{
  "compilerOptions": {
    "target": "es6",
    "module": "commonjs",
    "sourceMap": true,
    "outDir": "build",
    "rootDir": "src",
    "esModuleInterop": true,
    "allowSyntheticDefaultImports": true,
    "strict": true,
    "noImplicitAny": true,
    "moduleResolution": "node",
    "resolveJsonModule": true
  },
  "include": [
    "src/**/*",
    "public/**/*"
  ],
  "exclude": [
    "node_modules",
    "build"
  ]
}
